alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 2:19AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Cheyenne and northeastern Sherman Counties in northwestern Kansas through 200 AM MDT/300 AM CDT/... At 119 AM MDT/219 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles south of St. Francis to 9 miles northwest of Goodland. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Cheyenne and northeastern Sherman Counties in northwestern Kansas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
